summary: This will buff up the masterspells, so they will be truly powerful.. I made the charge-time 5 sec though, just for balance..
descriptionHtml:
This mod will enhance all the three master destruction spells, so that they would be a worthy reward for all the shit you needed to get through to get them. A true reward for becoming a frozen sorcerer, a fiery wizard, or a sparkling fairy.

What I did:

I made the blizzard make 20 pts for 30 sec, would be more realistic as it is a blizzard... 
I made the firestorm take about 300 pts, as it too needed to pack a punch...
I made the thunderstorm take about .. a houndred? I don\'t really remember.. :/

ALL OF THEM NOW NEEDS 5sec to CHARGE (FOR BALANCE) !


AAAAAND I just made the wizard\'s fire a little more powerful (from 60 to 75), cuz I found It little rewarding... BtW: I changed some of the names, mainly because they were not that well fitting.




HOW TO INSTALL:

- go get yourself something to drink, IN A GLASS (hydration is important)

- now that you have gotten the drink you may drink half of it

- then you may overview the mod page

- and now take just a little sip of your drink thereafter

- it is important to read the description, remember to do that

- take just a little sip more, leaving about 1/4 left in the glass

- now you may click the download with manager button

- while it dowloads you may finish your drink

- And at last you may sit yourself comfertably back in a chair with a straight back

- now you may double-tap the mod in the manager

- adjust your back meanwhile, not to make long term injury

- and then click the \"OK\" button.

 ..... Just to play skyrim now .....
author: myself
